name: Disinfect Shooter
description:
Save the city from the virus by shooting infected people using your high-tech disinfect gun to cure them while also protecting people you've already cured from getting the virus again. Upgrade your disinfect gun and fight with the disease to save the city! 

This game was made for a mini game jam organised by the robotics team X Sharc 6838 using a javascript library called p5.js. Theme of the jam was covid-19. This is the game I created for it. I really wanted a top down shooter, so this was my approach. 

It really needs some balancing but it's in playable form. I had a lot to add but simply didn't have time.  Any feedback would be very appreciated!
